Name: Rift in Reality
Story Background: As magical energies surge, a tear in the fabric of reality emerges, distorting the laws of nature and unleashing unforeseen consequences upon the multiverse.
Ability: Rift in Reality allows you to exile target permanent. At the beginning of the next end step, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control with a sleight of hand counter on it. If it doesn't have sleight of hand counter on it, it's owner draws a card.
Appearance Description: The card depicts a surreal, shimmering fissure crackling with arcane energy, as a familiar landscape is twisted into unfamiliar shapes beyond the rift.
